data.meta_description: Sauk City, Wisconsin : Arkham House, 1992 . Octavo, cloth. First edition. The author's first collection of short fiction. Introduction and fourteen stories including Another Orphan, winner of the 1983 Nebula award. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. 28662 . Item #28662

Kessel, John.

[Sauk City, Wisconsin]: Arkham House, [1992]. Octavo, cloth. First edition. The author's first collection of short fiction. Introduction and fourteen stories including "Another Orphan," winner of the 1983 Nebula award. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. (28662). Item #28662
